value.string: Automation: AP 3 Way Invoice Match - Aurora Password Expiry Intimation

Hi Team,

This email is to inform you that the Aurora password for the username (RPM92). The bot has stopped execution.

Please change the password immediately. The credential vault also needs to be updated with new password.

Note: Invoices of this run will get picked in the next scheduled run.

Regards,
Bot
